sys_hub_flow_input.label: Error status
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_9c81d8b253411210041791e0a0490ec0

sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: Log (ERROR) that an error was occurred in the flow.
Send an email with error code and message to all ContractSync Admins and Creator.
Create a remote Incident record relative at the occurred error.
Create a local Incident record relative at the occurred error.
